## zrok enable

Enable an environment for zrok

```
zrok enable <token> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -d, --description string   Description of this environment (default "<user>@<hostname>")
  -h, --help                 help for enable
```

  -p, --panic     Panic instead of showing pretty errors
